text: Ezɨ Amonia kamaghɨn fo, me Devitɨn gumazibagh amizir bizir kam bagh, a bar men anɨngaghegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me nguibar avɨrir kabar mɨdorozir gumaziba bagha akaba amangi. Egha me Sirian kantrin aven itir nguibar ekiamning, Betrehop ko Soban mɨdorozir gumazitaba iniasa, me ko akam akɨrasa ghue. Ezɨ me Amonian akurvaghasa 20,000plan mɨdorozir gumaziba amada. Ezɨ me ua Topɨn nguibar ekiamɨn mɨdorozir gumazir 12,000pla ini. Egha me ua uarir akurvaghasa, 1,000plan mɨdorozir gumaziba bagha Makan atrivim ko akam akɨri.
